title: DrawFire
description: An AI tool for artists to improve their work, built with React, Flask, OpenAI, and OpenCV.
expanded_description: An interactive AI tool for artists and illustrators to improve their work. The app processes images and provides suggestions for enhancement, empowering users to refine their creations. Built using React, Flask, OpenAI, Cloudinary, and OpenCV.

title: WorldBuild
description: A platform for creators to showcase portfolios and collaborate, built with Vite/React and Flask.
expanded_description: A social collaboration platform for creators and character design artists. The app enables users to showcase portfolios, create project ideas, and collaborate with others to bring creative visions to life. Built using Vite/React, Flask, and SQLAlchemy.

title: Surviving_NYC
description: A text-based NYC adventure game with SQLite-backed stat tracking.
expanded_description: A humorous, choose-your-own-adventure game played through the command line. Players navigate absurd scenarios to try to survive a day in NYC. Built using Python, Flask, and SQLite.

title: ComicSpot
description: A React-based single-page application designed for comic book enthusiasts.
expanded_description: An interactive AI tool for artists and illustrators to improve their work. The app processes images and provides suggestions for enhancement, empowering users to refine their creations. Built using React, Flask, OpenAI, Cloudinary, and OpenCV.

title: Superhero Battler
description: Pick your favorite superhero's to match against each other, see who wins!
expanded_description: Get ready to rumble with the Superhero Battler! Pick your favorite superhero's to match against each other, see who wins! Pick Goku, Wolverine, Deadpool, Superman, Hulk, Thor, and many more!
